meanings.definition: An exercise in which a person hangs from a bar and pulls their body up until their chin is level with the bar.
meanings.sent1: During gym class, we practiced doing pullups to strengthen our arms.
meanings.sent2: He struggled to do pullups at the park's fitness area.
meanings.sent3: The monkey at the zoo showed off by effortlessly doing pullups on a branch.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to improve her fitness was evident as she attempted pullups every day.
meanings.sent5: The sound of grunting echoed in the gym as people pushed themselves to complete their pullups.
